class.name: base_local_planner/TrajectoryPlannerROS
class.description: A implementation of a local planner using either a DWA or Trajectory Rollout approach based on configuration parameters.

class.name: base_local_planner/MFTrajectoryPlannerROS
class.description: A implementation of a metalform local planner using DWA based on configuration parameters for new obstacle avoidance with front bumper trigger
